name: Pinhole Camera Calculator
description: You dont need an expensive camera to take photographs. Its a real fun to make your very own Pinhole camera out of a few simple items from around the house. This Pinhole Camera Calculator will help you to design one. Even if you are not a photographer youll probably love it. Pinhole photography is simplest and magical way to do photography. Its a world of creative freedom, imagination and experimentation which alters your view of reality.  No Ads!
